      • CUSTOM_METADATA_IS_LIVE_LOW_LATENCY

        static final String CUSTOM_METADATA_IS_LIVE_LOW_LATENCY
        Bundle key in MediaMetadataCompat to indicate whether the StraasMediaCore.PLAY_OPTION_LIVE_LOW_LATENCY bundle key in MediaControllerCompat.TransportControls.playFromMediaId(String, Bundle) is set to true or not. Use MediaController.getExtras().getBoolean(CUSTOM_METADATA_IS_LIVE_LOW_LATENCY)
        See Also:
        StraasMediaCore.PLAY_OPTION_LIVE_LOW_LATENCY, MediaControllerCompat.TransportControls.playFromMediaId(String, Bundle), Constant Field Values

      • PLAY_COUNT_SUM

        static final String PLAY_COUNT_SUM
        The sum of number of times the media (Live or VOD) played. Use MediaController.getExtras().getLong(PLAY_COUNT_SUM)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LIVE_DVR_ENABLED

        static final String LIVE_DVR_ENABLED
        Whether to enable live DVR feature for a live event. Use MediaController.getExtras().getBoolean(LIVE_DVR_ENABLED)

        static final String TYPE
        The event type indicates the live owns different functions and is used in different scenario. {event,sync,channel} Use MediaController.getExtras().getString(TYPE)

      • COVER_URL

        static final String COVER_URL
        The image shown in the Straas web player when a live streaming is off air. You could upload this image from the live info page in Straas CMS. Use MediaController.getExtras().getString(COVER_URL)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TEXT_TRACK_ID_ARRAY

        static final String TEXT_TRACK_ID_ARRAY
        The text track ID array for VOD. Use MediaController.getExtras().getStringArray(TEXT_TRACK_ID_ARRAY)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • IS_AUDIO_DISABLED

        static final String IS_AUDIO_DISABLED
        Bundle key in MediaSessionCompat extra to indicate whether the audio output is disabled. Bundle value is boolean type, the default value is false.

        For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via MediaControllerCompat.registerCallback(MediaControllerCompat.Callback) to get extras.

        See Also:
        StraasMediaCore.COMMAND_DISABLE_AUDIO, StraasMediaCore.KEY_DISABLE_AUDIO, Constant Field Values

      • SERVICE_FOREGROUND_IS_ENABLED

        static final String SERVICE_FOREGROUND_IS_ENABLED
        Bundle key in MediaSessionCompat extra to get the boolean value that indicates the foreground mode is enabled or not. If foreground mode is enabled, the Straas MediaBrowserServiceCompat will run in foreground when player state is not PlaybackStateCompat.STATE_PAUSED, PlaybackStateCompat.STATE_STOPPED, or PlaybackStateCompat.STATE_NONE.

        For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via MediaControllerCompat.registerCallback(MediaControllerCompat.Callback) to get extras.

        See Also:
        StraasMediaCore.COMMAND_FOREGROUND, StraasMediaCore.COMMAND_STOP_FOREGROUND, Constant Field Values

      • LIVE_BROADCAST_STATE_V2

        static final String LIVE_BROADCAST_STATE_V2
        Bundle key in MediaSessionCompat extra to indicate the broadcast status of the live event(v2). For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via MediaControllerCompat.registerCallback(MediaControllerCompat.Callback) to get extras.

        The value must be one of the following:

        • LiveEventListener.BROADCAST_STATE_UNKNOWN
        • LiveEventListener.BROADCAST_STATE_STARTED
        • LiveEventListener.BROADCAST_STATE_STOPPED
        • LiveEventListener.BROADCAST_STATE_WAITING_FOR_STREAM
        • LiveEventListener.BROADCAST_STATE_ENDED
        • LiveEventListener.BROADCAST_STATE_DVR_PLAYBACK_AVAILABLE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LIVE_STATISTICS_CCU

        static final String LIVE_STATISTICS_CCU
        Bundle key in MediaSessionCompat extra to indicate the concurrent users of the live event. For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via registerCallback(...) and listen either onSessionEvent or onExtrasChanged to get real-time value change. Both the event name and the Bundle key is this constant, value is an integer.
        See Also:
        doc, Constant Field Values

      • LIVE_STATISTICS_HIT_COUNT

        static final String LIVE_STATISTICS_HIT_COUNT
        Bundle key in MediaSessionCompat extra to indicate the media hit count of the live event. For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via registerCallback(...) and listen either onSessionEvent or onExtrasChanged to get real-time value change. Both the event name and the Bundle key is this constant, value is an integer.
        See Also:
        doc, Constant Field Values

      • KEY_TEXT_TRACKS

        static final String KEY_TEXT_TRACKS
        Bundle key in MediaSessionCompat extra to indicate the subtitle list. For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via registerCallback(...) and listen onExtrasChanged to get real-time value change. Both the event name and the Bundle key is this constant, value is string which can convert to subtitle list.
        See Also:
        Cue, Constant Field Values

      • LIVE_BROADCAST_START_TIME

        static final String LIVE_BROADCAST_START_TIME
        Bundle key for indicate that the broadcast start time of the live event, also means that it is on LIVE now. For client side, use MediaControllerCompat.getExtras() or register callback via MediaControllerCompat.registerCallback(MediaControllerCompat.Callback) to get extras. The value type is Long.
        See Also:
        LIVE_BROADCAST_STATE_V2, Constant Field Values
